Class JobServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.isdintership.epe.service.impl.JobServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.isdintership.epe.service.JobService
@Service class JobServiceImpl extends Object implements com.isdintership.epe.service.JobService
JobServiceImpl is a service class that implements the JobService interface.

This class provides a few methods to manipulate the job records in the data source

1.0
